name: WindowBlinds Skin Settings
summary: Learn about .WB4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WindowBlinds is a Windows program that allows users to reskin Windows' user interface. Custom skins created using WindowBlinds are saved as WBA files.
Each WBA file contains a variety of files used to load and apply that skin. One of these files is a WB4 file, which contains skin-related settings.

description: A WB4 file is a settings file used by a Stardock WindowBlinds skin. It is placed in the skin's directory after the skin is unpacked from a .WBA file. WindowBlinds uses data stored in the WB4 file to open the associated skin.

instructions: WB4 files are not meant to be opened by users. Stardock WindowBlinds references WB4 files when opening an associated skin.
